title: 有问题啦！
author: Forever小贵
txt_content: 话说http://servers.minecraftforum.net/register里面怎么填，我想和外国人交流一下。

replies.author: Cpt.Dunn
replies.txt_content:
Forever小贵 发表于 2013-5-22 12:06 
出现了这行字，该怎么解决：An error occurred while registering your account. Please try again.Error ...
用户名有非法符号什么的从新弄一个

replies.author: Cpt.Dunn
replies.txt_content:
Username
你的用户名
Password
密码
Confirm Password
确认密码
Email
邮箱
Recaptcha
验证码,输入这两个词即可
之后把两个框框上即可.



希望采纳~！

replies.author: Forever小贵
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Forever小贵 于 2013-5-22 19:12 编辑 
Cpt.Dunn 发表于 2013-5-22 01:28 
Username
你的用户名
Password
出现了这行字，该怎么解决：An error occurred while registering your account. Please try again.Error Code: InvalidUsername

replies.author: Forever小贵
replies.txt_content:
Cpt.Dunn 发表于 2013-5-22 21:37 
用户名有非法符号什么的从新弄一个
偶也，行了，谢谢！！
